name: Horde
startIntroPart1: Hail, my domain!  I am Gull'dan, Chieftain of the Burning Blade, and you have no doubt entered my service.  The time has come to glorify our greatness and subjugate this world!
attacked: I will make an ornament out of your people!
introduction: Our meeting was already part of my plans.

name: Alliance
startIntroPart1: Greetings, traveler!  I am Terenas Menethil II, King of Lordaeron.  Welcome to our lands, where the forces of light and righteousness are incomparable.  Welcome to a world where honor and valor are the highest virtues.
declaringWar: My friend... You don't know what you're doing.
attacked: It's necessary.  It's for the common good.
tradeRequest: I'm ready to offer you this.

name: The Undead
startIntroPart1: Aah, mortal creatures, have you decided to come to me?  You suffer the greatest humiliation of choosing to confront the Lich King, Arthas Menethil.  You hopeless creatures will now become part of my vast army of undead.  Death is inevitable, but you can become one of us, provided you accept your new destiny.
declaringWar: In this battle, you will die!
attacked: My sword has wanted this for a long time!
tradeRequest: I need it, right here and now.

name: Night Elfs
startIntroPart1: Greetings, traveler!  I am Malfurion, Stormrage, prophet and champion of nature.  Welcome to these sacred lands, where the ancient forces of nature weaved a web of life and death on this land.  Are you ready to throw off the burden of vain worries and take the path of natural wisdom and harmony with the world around us?
attacked: Believe me, this is done for good.
